en.title: What Creators Say About FLUX.1 Dev
en.description: Real experiences from artists, developers, and creators using FLUX.1 Dev

items.name: Sarah Chen
items.content: FLUX.1 Dev has revolutionized my creative process. The level of detail and prompt adherence is incredible. I can bring my most complex ideas to life with stunning accuracy.

items.name: Marcus Rodriguez
items.content: As a researcher, I'm impressed by FLUX.1 Dev's technical capabilities. The transformer architecture delivers consistent, high-quality results that exceed other models in our benchmarks.

items.name: Emma Thompson
items.content: The speed and quality balance is perfect for our workflow. FLUX.1 Dev generates professional-grade images quickly, helping us meet tight deadlines without compromising on quality.

zh.title: 创作者对 FLUX.1 Dev 的评价
zh.description: 使用FLUX.1 Dev的艺术家、开发者和创作者的真实体验

items.name: 陈莎拉
items.content: FLUX.1 Dev彻底改变了我的创作流程。细节水平和提示词遵循度令人难以置信。我可以以惊人的准确度将最复杂的想法变为现实。

items.name: 马库斯·罗德里格斯
items.content: 作为研究员，我对FLUX.1 Dev的技术能力印象深刻。变压器架构提供一致的高质量结果，在我们的基准测试中超越了其他模型。

items.name: 艾玛·汤普森
items.content: 速度和质量的平衡对我们的工作流程来说是完美的。FLUX.1 Dev快速生成专业级图像，帮助我们在不妥协质量的情况下满足紧迫的截止日期。
